definitions.definition: (past tense clad or cladded) To cover (with insulation or another material); to surround, envelop.
(in compounds) Wearing clothing of a specified type.
(in compounds) Covered, enveloped in or surrounded by a specified material or substance.
To adorn or cover with clothing; to dress; to supply clothes or clothing.
definitions.example: to feed and clothe a family; to clothe oneself extravagantly

definitions.definition: To cover or invest, as if with a garment.
definitions.example: to clothe somebody with authority or power
